content:
Scenario: Teen learns that ecological care is intergenerational justice
    Given current consumption patterns affect future generations
    And Jasmine's choices impact the world her future children will inherit
    When bioregional_elohim frames ecological decisions
    Then it should connect her choices to intergenerational impact
    And help her understand ecological care as care for future people
    And recognize that environmental stewardship is care work across time
    And build her sense of responsibility to future generations
    And demonstrate that care economy extends forward in time
    And support her generation's commitment to leaving a livable world
